DEF.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Battle Moves/Traits: DEF.
By Trickster on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 04:24 pm:

TraitDescriptionAnima Cost
HardbodySmall LifeDamage may be nullified.1500
DefenderThis is an up-grade of Hardbody. Small LifeDamage may be nullified.2500
StrongheartSmall GutsDamage may be nullified.1500
PowerfulDecreases damage received from Pow. Type Skills but increases damage caused by Int. Type Skills1000
IntelligentDecreases damage received from Int. Type Skills but increases damage caused by Pow. Type Skills.1000
CautionWhen attacked by Short-range Skills this increases chances for evading the attack.1300
Sixth SenseWhen attacked by Far-range Skills this increases chances for evading the attack.1300
ToughnessWhen attacked by Short-range Skills this may decrease damage.1200
Strong BodyWhen attacked by Far-range Skills this may decrease damage.1200
ForesightIncreases chances to evade attack but increases damage if hit.1500
InsightWhen Guts are above 50 the higher your Guts are the more damage you will inflict. Chances for evading an attack increases.2000
EnthusiasmWhen Guts are above 50 the higher your Guts are the more damage you will inflict. Decreases damage caused by enemy attacks.2000
